Corrupted:InfernalCore.NAME: Glock with a star on it
Corrupted:InfernalCore.FLAVOR: Its just a Glock. what else do you expect?
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain 2 ManaRegen.

Corrupted:ManaReactor.NAME: Mana Reactor
Corrupted:ManaReactor.FLAVOR: This odd artifact generates Mana whenever the holder takes damage... weird.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b1 #yMana whenever you receive unblocked attack damage.

Corrupted:OddShapedKey.NAME: Odd Shaped Key
Corrupted:OddShapedKey.FLAVOR: This Key is more of a decorative peace than anything.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E], Whenever you open a non-Boss chest, add #b1 more status to your draw pile at the beginning of every combat.

Corrupted:LoreDiary.NAME: Lore Diary
Corrupted:LoreDiary.FLAVOR: The more you Look at it, the more Familiar the text is.
DESCRIPTIONS: non-boss chests now also contain #pLore #pcard rewards. NL Smithing a #pLore #pcard also upgrades a random  non-Lore card.
